headline: Trumpism is here to stay in Georgia no matter what happens during Tuesday's primaries
author: Mabinty Quarshie
sentences: The former president has made it his mission to oust Republicans who did not embrace his false claims of election fraud from office, including Georgia Gov.
Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger after they refused to overturn Georgia's 2020 presidential election results.
Trump wants to exact revenge on Republicans who did not overturn Georgia's 2020 presidential election results.
Trump's endorsements may not help candidates win Georgia's primary due to the strength of incumbents.
But his presence will still be felt throughout the Peach State  no matter how the elections turn out.
WASHINGTON  Donald Trump will not be on the ballot during Georgia's primary elections on Tuesday.
Donald Trump has endorsed several Republicans in Georgia's high-profile races.
